overview: The story of families seeking to undo decades of repression and assimilation of the Kurdish language by taking matters into their hands. Now, every home is a school.  A banned language, a sealed school, children studying in their mother tongue at home, and families who convert their homes to schools. ‘Every home is a school’ is the story of defiant people who seek to revive and keep alive a forbidden language.
title: Every Home is a School
